RI's version is JAX-WS RI 2.3.3 git-revision#b4c5bb6.--> <xs:schema version="1.0" targetNamespace="http://catalog.globalbooks/" xmlns:tns="http://catalog.globalbooks/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="products" type="tns:productList"/> <xs:complexType name="productList"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="product" type="tns:product" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="product"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="price" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element name="quantity" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

con:call.name: Add_req
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cat="http://catalog.globalbooks/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <cat:addProduct>\r <product>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <description>A thrilling fantasy novel about dragons.</description> <!--Optional:-->\r <id>3</id> <!--Optional:-->\r <name>Dragon's Breath</name>\r <price>22.50</price>\r <quantity>50</quantity> </product>\r </cat:addProduct>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:call.name: update
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cat="http://catalog.globalbooks/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <cat:updateProduct>\r <product>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <description>A thrilling fantasy novel about dragons.</description> <!--Optional:-->\r <id>1</id>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <name>Dragon's Breath</name>\r <price>22.50</price>\r <quantity>50</quantity>\r </product>\r </cat:updateProduct>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
